content: Thank you so much, Shawn! I love it when someone reads something I’ve written and it pleases them. Your comments made my day. I have a couple more Growing up In Portugal ones which came about after writing the first two, which then reminded me of other stuff that happened — like the time I attended a drunken picnic, drank 5 litres of red wine, passed out on a stream bank and was subsequently dragged home on the back of a motor cycle — Ha ha ha. And interestingly enough, I will be pursuing what came later, because there were tons of silly little things that will make a good story. I will be watching out for your story. Being a journalist, I am always fascinated by other peoples’ stories. Bring it!
